verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw בִּלְעָ֗ם <WH1109> And when Balaam כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ט֞וֹב <WH2895> be better בְּעֵינֵ֤י <WH5869> affliction יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD לְבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> to bless אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not הָלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> he went כְּפַֽעַם־ <WH6471> not as at other times בְּפַ֖עַם <WH6471> times לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> to seek נְחָשִׁ֑ים <WH5173> for enchantments וַיָּ֥שֶׁת <WH7896> but he set אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> toward the wilderness פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> his face

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> lifted up בִלְעָ֜ם <WH1109> And Balaam אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> and he saw אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel שֹׁכֵ֖ן <WH7931> abiding לִשְׁבָטָ֑יו <WH7626> [in his tents] according to their tribes וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> came עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> and the spirit אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <WH4912> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said נְאֻ֤ם <WH5002> hath said בִּלְעָם֙ <WH1109> Balaam בְּנ֣וֹ <WH1121> the son בְעֹ֔ר <WH1160> of Beor וּנְאֻ֥ם <WH5002> hath said הַגֶּ֖בֶר <WH1397> and the man שְׁתֻ֥ם <WH8365> are open הָעָֽיִן׃ <WH5869> whose eyes

נְאֻ֕ם <WH5002> He hath said שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> which heard אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> the words אֵ֑ל <WH410> of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Who מַחֲזֵ֤ה <WH4236> the vision שַׁדַּי֙ <WH7706> of the Almighty יֶֽחֱזֶ֔ה <WH2372> which saw נֹפֵ֖ל <WH5307> falling וּגְל֥וּי <WH1540> open עֵינָֽיִם׃ <WH5869> [into a trance] but having his eyes
מַה־ <WH4100> How טֹּ֥בוּ <WH2895> How goodly אֹהָלֶ֖יךָ <WH168> are thy tents יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> O Jacob מִשְׁכְּנֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH4908> [and] thy tabernacles יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> O Israel

כִּנְחָלִ֣ים <WH5158> As the valleys נִטָּ֔יוּ <WH5186> are they spread forth כְּגַנֹּ֖ת <WH1593> as gardens עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> beside נָהָ֑ר <WH5104> by the river's side כַּאֲהָלִים֙ <WH174> as the trees of lign aloes נָטַ֣ע <WH5193> hath planted יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> which the LORD כַּאֲרָזִ֖ים <WH730> [and] as cedar trees עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> beside מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> beside the waters

יִֽזַּל־ <WH5140> out מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> the water מִדָּ֣לְיָ֔ו <WH1805> of his buckets וְזַרְע֖וֹ <WH2233> and his seed בְּמַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> [shall be] in many וְיָרֹ֤ם <WH7311> shall be higher מֵֽאֲגַג֙ <WH90> than Agag מַלְכּ֔וֹ <WH4428> and his king וְתִנַּשֵּׂ֖א <WH5375> shall be exalted מַלְכֻתֽוֹ׃ <WH4438> and his kingdom

אֵ֚ל <WH410> God מוֹצִיא֣וֹ <WH3318> brought him forth מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt כְּתוֹעֲפֹ֥ת <WH8443> he hath as it were the strength רְאֵ֖ם <WH7214> of an unicorn ל֑וֹ יֹאכַ֞ל <WH398> he shall eat up גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> the nations צָרָ֗יו <WH6862> his enemies וְעַצְמֹתֵיהֶ֛ם <WH6106> their bones יְגָרֵ֖ם <WH1633> and shall break וְחִצָּ֥יו <WH2671> [them] through with his arrows יִמְחָֽץ׃ <WH4272> and pierce

כָּרַ֨ע <WH3766> He couched שָׁכַ֧ב <WH7901> he lay down כַּאֲרִ֛י <WH738> as a lion וּכְלָבִ֖יא <WH3833> and as a great lion מִ֣י <WH4310> who יְקִימֶ֑נּוּ <WH6965> who shall stir him up מְבָרֲכֶ֣יךָ <WH1288> ? Blessed בָר֔וּךְ <WH1288> [is] he that blesseth וְאֹרְרֶ֖יךָ <WH779> thee and cursed אָרֽוּר׃ <WH779> [is] he that curseth

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֤ף <WH639> anger בָּלָק֙ <WH1111> And Balak's אֶל־ <WH413> against בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> against Balaam וַיִּסְפֹּ֖ק <WH5606> together אֶת־ <WH853> כַּפָּ֑יו <WH3709> his hands וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said בָּלָ֜ק <WH1111> and Balak אֶל־ <WH413> against בִּלְעָ֗ם <WH1109> unto Balaam לָקֹ֤ב <WH6895> thee to curse אֹֽיְבַי֙ <WH341> mine enemies קְרָאתִ֔יךָ <WH7121> I called וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> behold בֵּרַ֣כְתָּ <WH1288> and behold thou hast altogether בָרֵ֔ךְ <WH1288> blessed זֶ֖ה <WH2088> these שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> [them] these three פְּעָמִֽים׃ <WH6471> times

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now בְּרַח־ <WH1272> Therefore now flee לְךָ֣ אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמֶ֑ךָ <WH4725> thou to thy place אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> I thought כַּבֵּ֣ד <WH3513> thee unto great אֲכַבֶּדְךָ֔ <WH3513> honour וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold מְנָעֲךָ֥ <WH4513> hath kept thee back יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> but lo the LORD מִכָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> from honour

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said בִּלְעָ֖ם <WH1109> And Balaam אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּלָ֑ק <WH1111> unto Balak הֲלֹ֗א <WH3808> not גַּ֧ם <WH1571> again אֶל־ <WH413> about מַלְאָכֶ֛יךָ <WH4397> I not also to thy messengers אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom שָׁלַ֥חְתָּ <WH7971> which thou sentest אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> Spake לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> unto me saying

אִם־ <WH518> Though יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> would give לִ֨י בָלָ֜ק <WH1111> If Balak מְלֹ֣א <WH4393> full בֵיתוֹ֮ <WH1004> me his house כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְזָהָב֒ <WH2091> and gold לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> I cannot לַעֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> go beyond אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֣י <WH6310> the commandment יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do טוֹבָ֛ה <WH2896> [either] good א֥וֹ <WH176> or רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> or bad מִלִּבִּ֑י <WH3820> of mine own mind אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> What יְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [but] what the LORD אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> that will I speak

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> and now הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold הוֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> And now behold I go לְעַמִּ֑י <WH5971> unto my people לְכָה֙ <WH1980> come אִיעָ֣צְךָ֔ <WH3289> [therefore and] I will advertise אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what יַעֲשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> shall do הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> thee what this people הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> this לְעַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> to thy people בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> in the latter הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <WH4912> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said נְאֻ֤ם <WH5002> hath said בִּלְעָם֙ <WH1109> Balaam בְּנ֣וֹ <WH1121> the son בְעֹ֔ר <WH1160> of Beor וּנְאֻ֥ם <WH5002> hath said הַגֶּ֖בֶר <WH1397> and the man שְׁתֻ֥ם <WH8365> are open הָעָֽיִן׃ <WH5869> whose eyes

נְאֻ֗ם <WH5002> He hath said שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> which heard אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> the words אֵ֔ל <WH410> of God וְיֹדֵ֖עַ <WH3045> and knew דַּ֣עַת <WH1847> the knowledge עֶלְי֑וֹן <WH5945> of the most High מַחֲזֵ֤ה <WH4236> the vision שַׁדַּי֙ <WH7706> of the Almighty יֶֽחֱזֶ֔ה <WH2372> [which] saw נֹפֵ֖ל <WH5307> falling וּגְל֥וּי <WH1540> open עֵינָֽיִם׃ <WH5869> [into a trance] but having his eyes

אֶרְאֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH7200> I shall see וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not עַתָּ֔ה <WH6258> now אֲשׁוּרֶ֖נּוּ <WH7789> him but not now I shall behold וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not קָר֑וֹב <WH7138> him but not nigh דָּרַ֨ךְ <WH1869> there shall come כּוֹכָ֜ב <WH3556> a Star מִֽיַּעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> out of Jacob וְקָ֥ם <WH6965> shall rise שֵׁ֙בֶט֙ <WH7626> and a Sceptre מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> out of Israel וּמָחַץ֙ <WH4272> and shall smite פַּאֲתֵ֣י <WH6285> the corners מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וְקַרְקַ֖ר <WH6979> and destroy כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> all the children שֵֽׁת׃ <WH8351> Sheth

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become אֱד֜וֹם <WH123> And Edom יְרֵשָׁ֗ה <WH3424> shall be a possession וְהָיָ֧ה <WH1961> shall be a יְרֵשָׁ֛ה <WH3424> also shall be a possession שֵׂעִ֖יר <WH8165> Seir אֹיְבָ֑יו <WH341> for his enemies וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and Israel עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> shall do חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> valiantly
וְיֵ֖רְדְּ <WH7287> shall come he that shall have dominion מִֽיַּעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> Out of Jacob וְהֶֽאֱבִ֥יד <WH6> and shall destroy שָׂרִ֖יד <WH8300> him that remaineth מֵעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city

וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> And when he looked אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָלֵ֔ק <WH6002> on Amalek וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <WH4912> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said רֵאשִׁ֤ית <WH7225> [was] the first גּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> of the nations עֲמָלֵ֔ק <WH6002> Amalek וְאַחֲרִית֖וֹ <WH319> but his latter עֲדֵ֥י <WH5703> for ever אֹבֵֽד׃ <WH8> end [shall be] that he perish

וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> And he looked אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֵּינִ֔י <WH7017> on the Kenites וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> and took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <WH4912> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said אֵיתָן֙ <WH386> Strong מֽוֹשָׁבֶ֔ךָ <WH4186> is thy dwellingplace וְשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> and thou puttest בַּסֶּ֖לַע <WH5553> in a rock קִנֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7064> thy nest

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> shall יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become לְבָ֣עֵֽר <WH1197> be wasted קָ֑יִן <WH7014> Nevertheless the Kenite עַד־ <WH5704> long מָ֖ה <WH4100> How אַשּׁ֥וּר <WH804> until Asshur תִּשְׁבֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH7617> shall carry thee away captive

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <WH4912> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said א֕וֹי <WH188> Alas מִ֥י <WH4310> who יִחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> who shall live מִשֻּׂמ֥וֹ <WH7760> doeth אֵֽל׃ <WH410> when God

וְצִים֙ <WH6716> And ships מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> [shall come] from the coast כִּתִּ֔ים <WH3794> of Chittim וְעִנּ֥וּ <WH6031> and shall afflict אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> Asshur וְעִנּוּ־ <WH6031> and shall afflict עֵ֑בֶר <WH5677> Eber וְגַם־ <WH1571> also ה֖וּא <WH1931> he עֲדֵ֥י <WH5703> for ever אֹבֵֽד׃ <WH8> and he also shall perish

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> rose up בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> And Balaam וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> also went וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> and returned לִמְקֹמ֑וֹ <WH4725> to his place וְגַם־ <WH1571> also בָּלָ֖ק <WH1111> and Balak הָלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> went לְדַרְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH1870> his way פ
